Title: Web Development Using Python
Description: The camp aims to teach programming methods and how to think like a programmer in approaching problem-solving during the development of various projects, from the idea to project organization and development steps. It also aims to familiarize trainees with how the internet works and how websites are developed using the Django framework. This will enable trainees to use the Python language with confidence and begin building projects that serve individuals and society.
Goals: Understand the basics of using the command line interface (CLI) to control the computer. | Master the use of GIT to track versions of projects being developed, as well as the use of a GIT repository hosting provider such as Github, and ways to collaborate as a team to build projects using Git and Github. | Master the basics of the Python language and use it effectively. | Understand the basics of the Internet and the web and how it works. | The basics of building web pages and interfaces using HTML and formatting them with CSS. | Master the use of the Django framework to build websites. | Master the use of ORM to interact with databases. | Master the process of identifying users. | Master the process of granting and verifying permissions and authorizations. | Daily practical assignments throughout the camp. | 4 unit projects at the end of each unit. | Capstone project.
Features: A boot camp that ends with employment for outstanding students. | A learning methodology based on practical applications. | A supportive and competitive learning environment. | Encouraging self-learning. | Acquiring important programming skills. | Guidance and mentorship from technical experts to ensure optimal skill acquisition.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Passion for learning and development. | Eagerness to participate and submit laptops and daily assignments. | The trainee must dedicate themselves to the camp and benefit to the maximum extent possible.

Title: Web development using Java
Description: The camp aims to teach Java programming at both the first and second levels, to build advanced and professional servers using the Spring Boot framework according to the highest academic standards and best practices. This will equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to become professional backend web developers, capable of meeting the challenges of the job market, and providing innovative and effective technical solutions.
Goals: Enable students to understand the basic concepts of Java programming and object-oriented programming. | Apply programming skills to solve simple and then complex programming problems. | Learn how to use the Integrated Development Environment (IDE) to implement programs and detect errors. | Enable students to understand the basic concepts of the web and how websites work. | Apply programming skills to build servers using the Spring Boot framework. | Learn how to test REST APIs built into the server using Postman. | Enable students to understand the basic concepts of databases. | Develop programming skills in SQL and build databases. | Use ORM tools in Java to control databases. | Enable students to understand the basic concepts of protection from attacks and the importance of implementing them. | Deeply develop programming skills in Spring Boot by implementing Spring Security. | Develop server testing skills by learning JUnit testing and applying it to the server. | Build advanced, secure, and integrated websites that simulate real-world projects.
Features: A practical application-based learning methodology. | A supportive and competitive learning environment. | Outstanding graduates are nominated for the Academy's Career Fair to enhance employment opportunities. | Employment support through training on presentation and interview skills. | Guidance and mentorship from technical experts to ensure optimal skill acquisition. | Interactive workshops and discussion groups with specialists.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Good proficiency in English. | Ability to work in a team and participate effectively in activities. | Passion for learning and development in technical fields.

Title: LLAMA-based generative AI
Description: A camp that aims to develop practical skills in building and applying generative AI models based on LLAMA. Participants learn how to build generative AI models using LLAMA. The camp also features an intensive educational methodology that contributes to the acquisition of extensive technical knowledge within an applied learning environment under the supervision of a specialized teaching staff.
Goals: Develop practical skills in building and applying LLAMA-based generative AI models. | Build generative AI models using LLAMA. | Work on real-world use cases for generative AI models.
Features: Nominating outstanding participants for the Academy's Career Fair to enhance job opportunities. | A practical application-based learning methodology. | A supportive and competitive learning environment. | Professional skill development and Meta integration. | Developing a final project using LLAMA for a specific application. | Understanding Meta's strategic goals in the field of generative AI, and how camp graduates can contribute to achieving these goals through their acquired skills and knowledge. | Mentoring and guidance from technical experts to ensure optimal skill acquisition. | Interactive workshops and panel discussions with specialists.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | The applicant must hold a bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Good level of English. | Ability to work in a team and participate effectively in activities. | Passion for learning and development in technical fields. | Knowledge of the basics of the Python language. | Knowledge of the concept of Deep Learning.

Title: Data Science and Machine Learning
Description: The Data Science and Machine Learning Camp aims to introduce participants to data science and how to work with different types of data. This camp takes an applied approach that focuses on developing practical skills through real-world projects. Participants learn how to extract and analyze data and use modern machine learning techniques to build predictive and analytical models to solve practical problems and improve business.
Goals: Enhance collaboration and teamwork skills through collaborative data science projects. | Learn about data types and the challenges that may arise while working with them. | Apply machine learning principles in data analysis and modeling to solve real-world problems. | Develop participants' ability to present project results in a professional and understandable manner.
Features: A bootcamp for outstanding students that ends with employment. | A learning methodology based on practical applications. | A supportive and competitive learning environment. | All data concepts are presented within a practical framework known as "use cases," providing a realistic simulation experience of data projects in the job market. | Projects implemented during the camp are based on real data from diverse fields, not simply data designed specifically for educational purposes.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Excellent proficiency and prior knowledge of Python. | Experience using Git. | Basic knowledge of SQL. | A laptop running macOS or Windows. | Intermediate level of English. | Hold a university degree in a technical field or statistics. | A sincere desire to learn and actively participate throughout the camp.

Title: Game development using Unity
Description: An intensive bootcamp in game development using the Unity engine. It covers programming in C#, scene design, physics handling, user interfaces, animation, visual scripting, and the development of both 2D and 3D games, in addition to the fundamentals of publishing on various platforms. The bootcamp is based on weekly individual projects that strengthen practical skills and ensure the systematic and hands-on accumulation of knowledge. It concludes with a group project to develop and publish a complete game.
Goals: Understand the fundamental principles of game development. | Learn the latest tools and techniques used in game development to ensure the ability to keep pace with market developments. | Understand the fundamentals of object-oriented programming, C# programming, Unity, modeling in Unity, Animation, and game design principles, and build a strong knowledge base around them. | Implement practical projects that simulate real-world challenges to apply acquired skills and enhance deep understanding. | Practice using professional tools such as Git and Github to develop technical skills. | Master the design and development of PC and mobile games using the latest methodologies. | Enhance design thinking and problem-solving skills to provide innovative and practical solutions. | Understand market requirements in the field of game development and work to develop the skills required for career success. | Qualify trainees to obtain accredited professional certifications to enhance their career opportunities. | Develop the ability to work in teams and collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to ensure successful project implementation. | Enhance creative thinking and the ability to develop innovative technical solutions that meet the needs of users and companies. | Participate in interactive workshops and discussion groups with specialists to gain in-depth professional insights. | Motivate participants to continue learning and self-development to keep pace with rapid changes in the field.
Features: A learning methodology based on practical applications, ensuring effective and applied skill acquisition. | A supportive and competitive learning environment that helps enhance motivation and drive achievement. | Encourages self-learning and hones research and personal development skills. | Designed specifically for beginners, it offers gradual content in an accessible manner that helps participants build a solid foundation in the targeted field. | Covers the latest technologies and introduces the latest tools and practices in the technical field. | Interactive activities and projects that help apply concepts and enhance understanding. | Interactive workshops and discussion groups with specialists to ensure a comprehensive view of the field. | Guidance and mentorship from technical experts to ensure optimal skill acquisition. | Ongoing technical support from a professional team available to answer all inquiries during the camp. | An interactive learning community that provides an opportunity to connect with professional trainers and fellow participants to exchange experiences and expand their professional network. | Nominates outstanding participants to the Academy's employment forum to enhance job opportunities. | Employment support through training on presentation and interview skills. | Implementation of real-life applied projects that qualify trainees for the job market and add practical value to their CVs. Possibility of graduating with a complete project that addresses a real-world challenge in the technical field. | Certificate of attendance from the Academy upon completion of the camp. | Qualification of trainees to obtain international professional certifications such as Unity Associate Developer. | Introduction to the latest tools and practices in game development. | Mastery of basic and advanced concepts in game development. | Implementation of practical projects that enhance understanding of game development. | Training in the use of professional tools such as GitHub and Git ClickUp to enhance practical efficiency. | A comprehensive understanding of game development principles for application in future projects.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Ability to work as a team and participate effectively in activities. | Full-time availability during the camp period. | Hold a bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Prior knowledge of object-oriented programming. | Completion of the required qualifying courses on the Satar C# platform.

Title: 3D design art techniques
Description: The camp aims to provide trainees with basic 3D design skills through practical applications using Blender and Maya, character design, 3D environment construction, and practical projects applicable to video games and animation. The camp is an ideal choice for beginners and those interested in creative technologies who seek to develop their digital design skills and launch their careers in this promising field.
Goals: Master the fundamentals of 3D design, including modeling, digital sculpting, and 3D scene construction. | Learn the latest tools and techniques used in character and environment design, such as Blender and Maya, to ensure you keep up with the latest developments in the creative and technical market. | Gain a deep understanding of the basics of 3D modeling, master topology, and learn the principles of artistic rendering, establishing a solid foundation for launching into the fields of games and animation. | Implement applied projects that simulate design challenges in the fields of games and animation, contributing to the application of acquired skills and enhancing practical understanding. | Practice using professional tools such as Blender, Maya, and Substance Painter to design characters, build 3D environments, and apply textures and realistic colors. | Master the steps of designing and developing integrated 3D scenes that can be used in game engines or professional art projects. Enhance creative thinking and problem-solving skills to produce effective and innovative designs within work environments that simulate real-life challenges. | Understand market requirements in the field of 3D design, with a focus on the gaming and animation industries, and work to develop the technical and creative skills necessary for career success. | Qualify participants to build a professional portfolio and prepare for accredited professional certifications, enhancing their career opportunities in the local and global markets. | Develop the ability to work in teams and collaborate with diverse teams in the fields of design, art, and technology to ensure the success of creative projects. | Promote creative thinking and encourage participants to innovate visual and technical solutions that meet market needs. | Participate in interactive workshops and discussion sessions with experts in the field to gain professional insights and real-life knowledge. | Motivate participants to continue learning and self-development to keep pace with rapid changes in 3D design technologies.
Features: A practical application-based learning methodology ensures effective and applied skill acquisition. | A supportive and competitive learning environment that enhances motivation and encourages achievement. | Continuous encouragement of self-learning and honing research and personal development skills. | The camp is specifically designed for beginners, with graded content and a simplified approach that helps build a solid foundation in 3D design. | Coverage of the latest technical tools and practices such as Blender, Maya, and Substance Painter. | Interactive projects and applied activities that contribute to consolidating practical understanding. | Workshops and discussion sessions with specialists to broaden professional horizons and gain a comprehensive view of the field. | Direct supervision and continuous guidance from trainers and technical experts to ensure optimal educational outcomes. | Continuous technical support from a professional team available to answer inquiries throughout the camp. | An interactive learning community that enables participants to communicate and exchange experiences with their colleagues and trainers, contributing to building a strong professional network. | Nominating outstanding participants to the Academy's employment forum, enhancing their chances of securing suitable jobs. Providing specialized training in CV writing and interview preparation. | Implementing realistic applied projects that qualify trainees for the job market and enrich their professional portfolio. | The possibility of graduating with a comprehensive final project that addresses a real challenge in the technical field and reflects the trainee's readiness to enter the job market. | Certificates of attendance from the Academy upon completion of the camp, in partnership with Meta. | Learning the latest tools and practices in 3D design, using Blender to design characters, Maya to build environments, and Substance Painter to apply textures and realistic colors. | Mastering the basic concepts of modeling, organizing the mesh structures of 3D models (topology), along with lighting principles, preparing textures, and artistic design methods for games and animation. | Implementing practical projects that simulate the production of 3D characters and worlds usable in games or visual presentations. | Training in the use of professional tools that enhance practical efficiency and prepare trainees for the job market. Build a comprehensive understanding of the 3D design workflow, from concept development to professional-quality final output.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Hold a bachelor's degree in computer science or its equivalent. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Ability to work as a team and participate effectively in activities. | Full-time availability during the camp period. | Own a personal laptop with high-performance specifications to ensure efficient and smooth operation of 3D design programs. | No prior knowledge is required, but applicants should have a basic understanding of design basics or working with graphics programs.

Title: Development using extended reality XR technologies
Description: The camp aims to provide trainees with the basic skills to develop virtual and augmented reality experiences using Unity, through practical learning and interactive project implementation. It also provides trainees with knowledge of XR concepts, interaction design, and C# programming, in addition to integrating extended reality technologies with modern tools.
Goals: Enabling trainees to acquire the technical and technological skills necessary to develop innovative augmented and virtual reality applications and experiences. | Develop professional skills in extended reality (XR) technologies, integrating modern Meta tools and technologies. | Develop extended reality projects that meet user needs and contribute to the development of the modern applications industry.
Features: A stimulating learning environment that combines challenge and support to build a comprehensive XR community. | Direct supervision and mentorship from technical experts to ensure high-quality skill acquisition. | Interactive workshops and discussion sessions with specialists in XR, design, and programming to build a deeper understanding of the technologies. | Integration of emerging technologies into VR and AR. | Nomination of outstanding participants to the Academy's Career Fair to enhance job opportunities. | Certificates of attendance from the Academy upon completion of the program. | Qualification of trainees for international professional certifications (VR Developer from Unity). | Introduction to the latest tools and practices in developing virtual and augmented reality experiences using Unity and the XR Interaction Toolkit. | Mastery of basic and advanced concepts in C# programming, interaction design, motion tracking, and user experience in XR environments. | Implement practical projects that enhance understanding in [such as developing educational experiences, industrial simulations, or interactive games based on XR technologies]. | Training in using professional tools such as [GitHub, Vuforia, and Unity] to enhance practical proficiency.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Hold a diploma in a technical specialty or higher. | Bring a personal laptop. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Ability to work as a team and participate effectively in activities. | Full-time availability during the camp period.

Title: Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC)
Description: The GRC boot camp aims to prepare participants by focusing on understanding governance principles and implementation strategies, analyzing and assessing risks, and developing plans to address them. The program includes familiarizing participants with regulations and laws, implementing effective compliance strategies, and using common GRC tools and techniques to analyze data and assess compliance and risks. It also includes preparing trainees to obtain recognized GRC certifications, implementing practical projects to apply the acquired skills, and building a GRC framework for a virtual organization.
Goals: Understanding operating systems and networks. Ability to use process analysis and design tools. | Recognizing and applying key performance indicators (KPIs). | Acquiring practical skills in governance, risk management, and compliance. | Ability to develop risk analysis and assessment skills. | Applying governance concepts and compliance with legislation.
Features: Clearly link scientific knowledge and skills to practical capabilities through discussing real-life cases from global and local companies in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia | Develop policies and controls for real-life cases, conduct cyber risk assessments for real-life cases, and conduct compliance assessments for real-life scenarios.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | A personal laptop. | The applicant must have a bachelor's degree in a technical field.

Title: Security Operations Center - Level 1
Description: The camp aims to provide students with the fundamental knowledge and practical skills necessary to succeed in first- or second-level Information Security Administrator (SOC) positions. By exploring key topics such as phishing attack analysis, incident response procedures, threat detection methods, log review, SIEM system operation, and the use of security tools, students will acquire the fundamental skills required to monitor, investigate, and remediate security incidents in a SOC environment.
Goals: Understand the fundamental principles and practices of security operations. | Learn techniques for analyzing and detecting phishing attacks. | Master the use of a SIEM (Security Information Event Management) system to analyze and correlate events and manage security incidents. | Leverage threat intelligence to enhance security operations and improve incident response. | Understand digital forensics processes, common tools, and methodologies used. | Gain skills in monitoring and analyzing security events on individual systems. | Develop skills in monitoring network traffic to detect security threats and anomalies. | Learn best practices and procedures for incident response in a Security Operations Center (SOC) environment.
Features: A practical application-based learning methodology. | A supportive and competitive learning environment.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Knowledge of networking and operating systems basics.

Title: Building and developing artificial intelligence models
Description: The camp aims to introduce participants to comprehensive and advanced concepts related to artificial intelligence, with a focus on building a strong foundation in the fields of machine learning and deep learning using Python. During the camp, participants will gain a deep understanding of ways to effectively use data to train, improve, and evaluate models, with a focus on practical applications in diverse fields such as computer vision and natural language processing.
Goals: A comprehensive understanding of the fundamentals of artificial intelligence | Familiarization with libraries and tools related to data science and machine learning. | Understanding how to apply deep learning techniques in various fields. | Familiarization with cloud computing services related to artificial intelligence and managing machine learning processes. | Enabling the trainee to address current and future challenges using artificial intelligence. | Enhancing critical thinking skills and the ability to solve problems within teams. | Creating intensive and systematic collaborative projects to discuss some current problems and how to choose appropriate models to solve them.
Features: A practical application-based learning methodology. | A supportive and competitive learning environment. | A boot camp that ends with employment for outstanding students. | Guidance and counseling from technical experts to ensure optimal skill acquisition. | Interactive workshops and discussion groups with specialists.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Excellent proficiency in English. | Ability to program in Python. | Knowledge of data science basics.

Title: Building applications and websites using JavaScript
Description: The bootcamp aims to provide you with the knowledge and skills necessary to build and design websites and applications using JavaScript and frameworks such as React and Express. It also covers a comprehensive range of the latest technical topics that contribute to building advanced applications and websites, facilitating your entry into the workforce and streamlining the user experience within an applied learning environment under the supervision of a specialized teaching team.
Goals: Knowledge of research methods from reliable sources. | A deep understanding and application of programming concepts. | Developing and building applications and website pages. | The ability to deal with technical challenges. | Creating an effective and high-quality user experience.
Features: A boot camp for outstanding students that ends with employment. | A learning methodology based on practical applications. | A supportive and competitive learning environment.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Previous knowledge of a programming language.

Title: Develop mobile and web applications using Flutter
Description: The Flutter and Dart App Development Bootcamp offers you a comprehensive experience to gain programming skills from the basics to professional app publishing. You'll learn the basics of the Dart language, design distinctive user interfaces using Flutter, and understand the differences in mobile app development. You'll also learn how to use third-party libraries, work with APIs, and connect apps to servers, with a focus on advanced technologies that support your career path and prepare you for the job market.
Goals: Learn the Dart language and the Flutter framework, with a focus on associated tools, to enable them to develop modern and effective mobile applications. | Apply the acquired skills and concepts through practical projects and daily challenges, enhancing participants' analytical thinking and problem-solving skills. | Teach participants how to build integrated mobile applications, including interface design, database connectivity, and state management, using programming best practices. | Prepare participants to address common challenges that arise during application development by providing practical solutions and effective techniques to improve performance and ensure stability. | Prepare participants with the technical and professional skills necessary to meet the job market demands in the field of application development.
Features: Designed for Beginners: The camp offers a streamlined, step-by-step approach to help participants build a solid foundation in programming and app development. | Intensive Practical Learning: The camp includes practical sessions and applications that enhance understanding and develop practical application skills. | Covering the Latest Technologies: Learn about the latest tools and practices in mobile and web app development using Flutter and Dart. | Real-World Projects: The camp gives you the opportunity to implement real-world projects that reinforce your acquired skills and prepare you for the job market. | Job Market Skills: The program helps you acquire the technical skills required in app development, enhancing your career prospects. | Interactive Activities and Projects: A challenging learning experience that integrates hands-on learning. | Certified Certifications: Participants receive certificates of attendance provided by Tuwaiq Academy, adding value to your resume. | The camp is delivered in Arabic: To ensure that information is easily accessible and understood by all participants. | Ongoing Technical Support: A support team and experts are available to answer your questions throughout the camp. | An Interactive Learning Community: An opportunity to connect with professional trainers and fellow participants to share experiences and expand your professional network.
Requirements: Personal laptop. | Technical diploma or higher. | Full-time availability during the program. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Good level of English. | Ability to work in a team and participate effectively in activities. | Completion of the Flutter App Development track on the Satr platform. | Completion of the SQL 101 course on the Satr platform. | Completion of the SQL 102 course on the Satr platform.

Title: User Experience Design (UX/UI)
Description: The camp aims to enable participants to understand the basic concepts of user interface and user experience design, including conducting user research and analyzing user needs using the User-Centric Design and Design Thinking methodology. Participants will acquire the skills to design creative solutions to improve the user experience and build professional interfaces using professional design tools such as Figma.
Goals: Understand basic design principles and visual and interaction techniques to enhance user experience. | Be able to design applications and websites that help solve problems facing users in various areas of life using tools such as Figma. | Basic knowledge of the steps involved in building a user interface and experience, from research and prototyping to usability testing. | Knowledge of the fundamentals of user interface and experience design, while building a strong knowledge base that includes systems design, accessibility, interaction design, and visual design principles. | Learn user research methods to analyze user behaviors and needs and develop innovative solutions based on them. | Develop design thinking skills to work on integrated practical projects from inception to final solution delivery. | Prepare participants for the job market by enhancing their skills in preparing a professional portfolio and presenting their ideas effectively. | Increase the number of professionals in the field of user interface and experience design to meet job market needs.
Features: A boot camp for outstanding students that ends with employment. | A learning methodology based on practical applications. | A supportive and competitive learning environment. | The camp is held in partnership with the UX Design Institute. | Qualifies trainees to obtain the Professional Certification in UX Design (PCUX) certificate. | A comprehensive portfolio with applied projects.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop.

Title: Cybersecurity
Description: The 16-week Cybersecurity Bootcamp aims to prepare fresh graduates with advanced and comprehensive skills in various cybersecurity fields. The camp focuses on preparing participants for the job market by providing them with practical knowledge and essential skills in vulnerability analysis, reverse engineering, and security research development. The program aims to graduate security researchers capable of addressing global cybersecurity challenges.
Goals: Qualifying highly skilled security researchers to identify vulnerabilities and develop world-class security research. | Building the core skills of the security research community in the Kingdom. | Developing trainees with the most important skills and capabilities required in the field of cybersecurity.
Features: Practical projects. | Certificate of attendance provided by Tuwaiq Academy upon completion of the camp. | Camp leading to employment for outstanding students. | A supportive and competitive learning environment.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Background in reverse engineering and software analysis. | Familiarity with vulnerabilities and related issues. | Full-time availability during the camp period. Proficiency in English. | Must bring a personal laptop.

Title: Cloud Computing Engineering with Google Cloud
Description: The camp aims to equip trainees with the practical and technical skills necessary to design and implement cloud solutions on Google Cloud efficiently and professionally. It covers a wide range of services such as Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, BigQuery, and Cloud SQL, in addition to networking setup using VPC, load balancing, and Cloud CDN. It also covers securing cloud environments through identity and privilege management, as well as performance optimization, container management, and automation and deployment implementation.
Goals: Understand Google Cloud architecture and manage core cloud services such as Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, and BigQuery. | Interact with your Google Cloud environment through the Cloud Console and Cloud Shell to execute cloud tasks. | Set up and manage cloud networks using VPC, Cloud Load Balancing, and Cloud CDN. | Secure access to resources via Cloud IAM and apply best practices for security, key management, and encryption. | Deploy cloud applications. | Monitor performance and optimize costs using Cloud Monitoring, Logging, and BigQuery. | Manage billing and analyze usage to control costs and optimize resource consumption. | Automate deployment and management processes using Terraform and Cloud Deployment Manager. | Implement hybrid and multi-cloud solutions via Interconnect and VPN to bridge cloud and on-premises infrastructure. | Troubleshoot issues in your Google Cloud environment to ensure consistent performance and operational efficiency.
Features: A practical application-based learning methodology. | A stimulating and interactive learning environment that enables collaboration among trainees to enhance the learning experience. | Guidance and mentorship from certified trainers to ensure quality learning and understanding of core concepts. | Preparing participants for Google Cloud certifications such as Associate Cloud Engineer, enhancing opportunities to apply knowledge in daily work. | Enhancing employment opportunities in the field of cloud computing | Preparing trainees for the job market.
Requirements: The applicant must be a Saudi national. | Bring a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Commitment to attending all training sessions. | Good proficiency in English. | The trainee must have a basic background in information technology (e.g., networks, operating systems, and databases) and be prepared for practical learning and the use of technical tools.

Title: Fundamentals of Electronic Circuit Soldering
Description:
This course provides a comprehensive overview of the soldering techniques and tools used in assembling electronic circuits.
It aims to teach participants how to solder and inspect electronic components accurately and efficiently, with a strong emphasis on safety and quality. Participants will learn how to operate soldering equipment, identify various electronic components, and perform proper soldering to ensure reliable electrical connections.
Goals: Understand the fundamentals and tools of electronic soldering | Identify types and characteristics of electronic components | Use soldering tools and auxiliary materials correctly | Professionally solder and desolder electronic components | Inspect soldering quality and identify/correct common errors | Apply safety procedures when using soldering tools.
Features: Intensive hands-on training with a focus on real-world applications | Small training groups to ensure direct interaction with the instructor | Provision of training materials and tools for practical application | Certificate of completion issued by the academy.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Preferably have a basic background in electronics.

Title: Deep Learning with Keras
Description:
This training program focuses on deep learning using the Keras tool,
aiming to equip learners with the necessary skills to develop and implement deep learning models using the Keras framework within a Python environment.
Goals: Understand the principles of deep learning and neural networks | Acquire the skills to use Keras for building and training deep models | Learn techniques for optimizing and evaluating model performance | Implement real-world applications using Keras such as classification, prediction, and segmentation.
Features: Application-based learning methodology | Supportive and competitive learning environment.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | The applicant must hold a bachelor's degree.

Title: Fundamentals of Design and 3D Printing
Description:
The 3D Design and Printing program offers hands-on experience in 3D modeling using Onshape software.
Participants will learn the fundamentals of engineering modeling, editing designs, and preparing them for printing. The program also provides a comprehensive introduction to 3D printing, covering printer mechanisms, types, and materials used, all within an applied learning environment supervised by a specialized teaching team.
Goals: Enable students to use Onshape to create professional 3D designs | Understand how 3D printers work and how to operate them | Prepare and design projects ready for printing | Develop skills in engineering design and digital manufacturing..
Features: Intensive hands-on training focused on real-world scenarios | Small training groups for effective instructor engagement and provision of necessary materials and tools | Certificate of completion accredited by the academy.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Must hold a bachelor's degree in a technical field.

Title: Drone Programming and Operation
Description:
This program focuses on the technical programming concepts behind drones and the engineering and scientific principles that support them.
Participants will explore drone components and systems, how to integrate them with programming for control, and will simulate and operate drones in virtual physics-based environments to test a variety of operational tasks.
Goals: Learn drone programming tools | Explore and build virtual simulation systems | Complete hands-on projects to enhance drone programming skills.
Features: Interactive semester project for building a virtual drone programming environment | Hands-on drone programming training | Program delivered in Arabic.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Commitment to attend all training sessions. | Good level of English. | Programming background.

Title: Aerial Inspection
Description:
This training program is designed to equip participants with the knowledge and practical skills needed to perform aerial inspections using drones across different fields,
including energy, infrastructure, and construction. It combines theoretical education with field training, enabling participants to safely operate drones, plan inspection tasks, collect high-quality data, and analyze results to support informed and cost-effective decision-making by relevant stakeholders.
Goals: Understand types of drones, sensors, and their applications in aerial inspection | Learn GACA and GEOSA regulations, safety protocols, and risk assessment methods | Plan aerial inspection missions using best practices | Execute real-world drone inspection scenarios | Apply data processing techniques using various software and tools.
Features: Practical day at Banban Airport on the first Saturday | Realistic simulation of aerial inspection applications | Hands-on experience operating state-of-the-art drones | Certificate of completion.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Good level of English. | Commitment to attend practical sessions at Banban Airport.

Title: Mastering Cybersecurity Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC
Description:
This program provides comprehensive training to equip participants with the skills and competencies needed to manage cybersecurity governance and risk.
It focuses on enabling institutional compliance and achieving effectiveness through best practices aligned with market needs. Participants will learn how to assess cyber risks and implement appropriate cybersecurity controls.
Goals: Develop various cybersecurity governance, risk, and compliance documents efficiently | Develop and review cybersecurity controls and policies in line with international best practices | Conduct cybersecurity assessments aligned with global standards | Understand and link relevant cybersecurity legislation and policies across global, GCC, and Saudi contexts.
Features: Application-based learning methodology | Supportive and competitive environment | Program delivered in Arabic | Practical linkage between scientific knowledge and skills and real-world capabilities through case studies from local and global companies in Saudi Arabia | Development of policies, controls, and cyber risk assessments for real-life scenarios.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field

Title: Fundamentals of Programming Controllers (Arduino)
Description:
A simplified course designed for beginners, focusing on the foundational concepts of working with the Arduino platform.
The course aims to demystify basic principles in programming and electronics through easy-to-follow experiments. Participants will develop a solid understanding of the basics, learn the components and functions of the Arduino board, how to connect it to a computer, and how to write simple code to control inputs and outputs.
Goals: Introduce trainees to the Arduino platform and its main components | Learn the C++ programming language | Understand basic electrical and electronics principles for Arduino | Build the ability to connect various sensors | Develop problem-solving and creative thinking skills in electronics and programming
Features: Focus on practical applications and real projects | Starts with basic concepts and gradually progresses | Opens the door to advanced techniques and applications | Combines programming, electronics, and design | Covers diverse fields.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Commitment to attend all training sessions. | Experience in any programming language.

Title: Fundamentals of Cloud Infrastructure Engineering with Google Cloud
Description:
This program offers a comprehensive introduction to the core concepts and services of Google Cloud Platform (GCP),
helping beginners understand GCP’s foundational infrastructure, including computing, storage, and networking. It emphasizes hands-on learning through tools like the Google Cloud Console and Cloud Shell to enhance participants’ practical experience in building and deploying cloud applications effectively.

Features: Application-based learning methodology | Practical training using Google Cloud Console and Cloud Shell to gain skills in resource management and app deployment | Prepares participants for Google Cloud certifications such as Associate Cloud Engineer and encourages real-world application | Guided by certified instructors to ensure comprehension of core concepts | Supportive and competitive environment.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Commitment to attend all training sessions. | Good level of English. | Basic IT background (e.g., networks, operating systems, databases) and willingness to do hands-on learning and use technical tools.

Title: Security+ Information Security
Description:
The program introduces the foundational units of information security,
familiarizing participants with cybersecurity challenges, threats, and advanced methods for protecting data privacy. It also prepares trainees with the knowledge needed to pass the global certification exam (CompTIA Security+ Certification).
Goals: Identify cybersecurity threats and attacks | Understand types and uses of encryption tools | Learn core cybersecurity concepts and their importance to all organizations | Apply confidentiality, integrity, and availability principles | Protect privacy and personal data from breaches | Handle social engineering attempts | Apply risk management policies using specific tools.
Features: Supportive and competitive environment | Scenario-based learning methodology linking course topics to real cybersecurity situations | Guidance from technical experts to ensure optimal skill acquisition.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Familiarity with programming basics, preferably in C++ and Python. | Basic knowledge of computers, networks, and electronic devices.

Title: Fundamentals of the Internet of Things (IoT)
Description:
This program introduces participants to the basic concepts of the Internet of Things (IoT) and how to design and develop connected systems
that integrate smart devices with the cloud. It includes both theoretical and practical components covering programming, hardware, communication protocols, and IoT solutions — all within an applied learning environment led by a specialized instructional team.
Goals: Understand core concepts and foundations of the Internet of Things (IoT) | Explore IoT applications across industries | Learn to program connected devices using Raspberry Pi, Arduino, ESP, etc. | Master communication protocols like MQTT and HTTP | Understand security and privacy frameworks for connected systems.
Features: Intensive hands-on training focused on real-world applications | Small training groups to enable direct interaction with the instructor | Provision of training materials and tools for practical application | Certificate of completion accredited by the academy.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Familiarity with programming basics, preferably in C++ and Python. | Basic knowledge of computers, networks, and electronic devices.

Title: Drone Building and Calibration
Description:
A training program focused on the fundamentals of drone technology, along with the engineering and scientific principles behind it.
Participants will explore the parts and systems of drones, the role of each subsystem, and how to control them through programming. The program includes a practical component where trainees will build and operate drones from scratch, all within a hands-on learning environment under expert supervision.
Goals: Understand drone systems and components and their uses | Learn drone dynamics and autonomous systems | Explore core drone operation techniques and communication systems | Learn how to build and program drones.
Features: Program delivered in Arabic | Interactive semester project to build, assemble, and program drones | Certificates of attendance provided by Tuwaiq Academy | Hands-on drone operation training.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Commitment to attend all training sessions. | Good level of English. | Technical background.

by introducing them to drone technology, its components, basic operations, and control mechanisms. Goals: Learn how to organize and structure data in charts | Use functions like VLOOKUP and IF to structure and present data | Understand and apply Pivot Tables and how to categorize and display data simply.

Description:
The “Artificial Intelligence and Drones” program enables trainees to grasp key AI concepts and apply them in real-world scenarios.
Participants will learn about AI and drone applications, image processing, and how to train a YOLO model on real data to integrate AI into drone operations.
Goals: Understand artificial intelligence and drone applications | Learn the fundamentals of image processing | Learn how to apply AI models such as YOLO to drones.

Title: High-Speed Drone (FPV Drone)

A training program designed to elevate beginners and hobbyists to an advanced level.

Title: Game design and programming

This program introduces concepts and provides hands-on experience in game design and development.
It follows a blended learning model that combines self-paced online learning with in-person training. Trainees are required to complete online MOOC units before attending the in-person sessions. The program enables students to build a game prototype, enhancing their practical learning and preparing them to enter the game development industry professionally.
Goals: Gain a comprehensive understanding of game design and development | Develop student skills in creating game prototypes | Execute practical projects to enhance game development skills.
Features: Application-based learning methodology | Scientific and practical knowledge in game development | Professional certifications offered by HP.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a programming-related field. | Completion of MOOC units online.

Title: Web Development with ASP.net Core MVC
Description:
The program aims to build a solid foundation in software development using modern frameworks.
Participants will explore the concept of frameworks and the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern, including how to create key components such as Views, Models, and Controllers. The course also covers working with forms and databases, performing CRUD operations, exploring and testing APIs within and outside the project, and implementing essential security practices such as authentication for login, registration, and logout.
Goals: Understand the full structure of an ASP.NET Core MVC project | Learn how to manage the frontend | Understand integration between project components and data exchange among Model, Controller, and View | Develop database management skills and perform basic operations | Gain the ability to implement security features and build authentication pages | Explore technical areas such as APIs and project management using GitHub.

Goals: Learn the fundamentals of drone technology | Understand how to operate drones | Learn general maintenance of essential equipment | Understand recreational aviation regulations.

Title: Mastering Cybersecurity Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC

This program offers comprehensive training to develop participants’ skills and capabilities in managing cybersecurity governance and risk.
It empowers organizations to maintain compliance and effectiveness based on market needs, while equipping participants to assess cyber risks and implement appropriate cybersecurity controls.
Goals: Develop various cybersecurity governance, risk, and compliance documents efficiently | Develop and review cybersecurity controls and policies in line with international best practices | Conduct cybersecurity assessments aligned with global standards | Understand and link relevant cybersecurity legislation and policies across global, GCC, and Saudi contexts.
Features: Supportive and competitive learning environment | Program delivered in Arabic | Discussion of real business cases from the Saudi, Gulf, and global markets | Link scientific knowledge and practical capabilities through case studies from companies in Saudi Arabia | Development of policies, controls, and cyber risk assessments for real-life scenarios.

Title: Integrated Information Systems Audit
Description:
This program equips trainees with the knowledge and skills required to evaluate and verify the effectiveness of information systems and IT infrastructures in organizations.
It also ensures that the auditing practices used in information systems align with international standards.
Goals: Evaluate IT governance and management: Learn how to ensure IT is well-managed and aligned with business strategy | Audit information systems: Study effective auditing techniques for IT systems, including controls to ensure efficiency and compliance | Protect information: Understand how to secure information and systems against external and internal threats | Manage IT services: Evaluate technical service delivery to ensure quality support and proper issue resolution | Assess application and IT system security: Learn to verify the integrity and safety of applications and systems | Manage IT risks: Ensure the organization has effective strategies to handle IT-related risks | Analyze IT environment: Develop skills to assess the tech landscape and support auditing decisions.
Features: Globally recognized: CISA is one of the most respected certifications in IT auditing and cybersecurity, considered a global standard by international organizations | Professional competency boost: CISA provides deep knowledge on evaluating IT systems including security, management, and risks, enhancing problem-solving capabilities | Audit skills focus: The course strengthens IT audit skills across governance, cybersecurity, and risk management | Global compliance: Helps participants understand and apply best practices such as COBIT and ISO/IEC 27001, ensuring alignment with global standards | Career opportunities: Holding a CISA certification opens doors to careers in IT auditing, information security, risk management, and compliance | Enhanced security and compliance: Learn how to assess security control effectiveness to protect data and reduce risks | Comprehensive risk analysis: Understand how to evaluate and manage IT-related risks for system security | Continuous assessment: Includes ongoing analysis of IT audit tools and techniques for accurate and data-driven reporting | IT management expertise: Develop knowledge in areas like project management, data governance, and network security | Critical thinking focus: Improve analytical and critical thinking skills to assess IT environments and identify system design flaws | Flexible learning options.
Requirements: The applicant must be Saudi. | Own a personal laptop. | Bachelor's degree in a technical field. | Practical knowledge of IT auditing. | Practical knowledge of information security and protection. | Practical knowledge of risk management. | Practical knowledge of IT governance. | Practical knowledge of compliance evaluation.
